created_at.description: Timestamp indicating the date and time when the step was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating the date and time when the step was last updated

disabled.description: Flag indicating if the step is disabled or not

type.description: Type or category of the step

name.description: Name or title of the step

day.description: Day of the week for the step

step_number.description: Sequential number assigned to the step within the cadence

details.description: Additional details or information related to the step

id.description: Unique identifier of the additional details

cadence.description: Information about the sales cadence associated with the step

id.description: Unique identifier of the sales cadence

_href.description: Hyperlink reference to the sales cadence
